instructions:
This is the  character sheet for'GODSEND Agenda', by Khepera Publishing.

* [GODSEND-Agenda-3-Beta-Test](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/305357/GODSEND-Agenda-3-Beta-Test?affiliate_id=135577)  on DriveThuRPG

useroptions.description: When checked, the rolls made from the sheet are only visible to the player and the GM.
If active, sheet will as for dice modifiers before every roll.
Choose what dice is used of the rolls from the sheet. GODSEND Agenda uses '2d10', while some other variations like Talislanta, Hellas & Atlantis use a 'd20'.
